title: [K-12] Mobile Technology-Based Inquiry Science Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education methodologies and experience in using mobile devices
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening pre-service teachers' ability to design and implement inquiry-based science classes using mobile technology.

learning_goals: Learners can complete the design of step-by-step inquiry-based science lessons using mobile applications and tools.
Learners can develop open-ended questioning strategies to engage learners and apply them in actual classes.
Learners can diagnose understanding in real-time and provide feedback using smartphone-based formative assessment tools.

resources: Smartphone-compatible educational apps (Quizlet, Google Forms, etc.)
Offline inquiry activity kit (simple science experiment tools)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
